item.title: Last minute Getting Around information for Berlin Buzzwords
item.description: Last minute Getting Around information for Berlin Buzzwords # I’ve been sharing information on how to get around in Berlin more often than I’d like to type it out - putting it here for future reference. Before going to Berlin make sure to put an app on your phone that helps with finding the right public transport mix to use for going from one place to another: Nokia Public Transit for WP7 phones
